revised_title: Discovery of a New Parasite in Earthworms
tldr: The author discovered a new parasite in earthworms that is similar in its developmental stages to Lyrophycyozon cobayce, a parasite found in guinea pigs. The parasite is present in about one out of five earthworms and has not been seen in the blood or coelomic fluid of its host. The author suggests calling the new parasite Spirochceta lumbrici.
